text: Hi everyone. It's Jennifer.
Do you want to practice speaking English?
I'm sure you d,o but I think some of you feel like you have no one to practice with.
I'd like to offer a solution.
I plan to offer another small group course on Seymour. I'll be running a five-week
intermediate conversation course from January 28th to March 1st.
I'll accept up to 4 students for this course.
Live classes will be on Wednesdays at 9 o'clock a.m. That's Boston time,
so be sure to check the local time all
Live classes will be held through zoom and they'll run for 60 minutes
The live classes will be recorded.
The topics of this course will largely be decided by you the students.
My 4 students will take turns speaking about their personal interests and
experiences based on photos they can share with the group.
You'll get to know your classmates quite well.
And after the course ends, our private discussion board will still be accessible.
That means you can stay in touch with new friends
Recommended speaking tasks will give you additional practice between
classes. Each week on Simor you can upload an audio or video file on our private discussion board.
This is a chance to receive more feedback from me and you can interact more with your classmates.
The course fee is 125 US dollars. This fee covers five live classes,
five speaking tasks
access to class recordings and
of course my personal feedback for five weeks.
You'll need a webcam, a microphone, and a good internet connection to participate.
Registration opens January 21st. Our first live class will be on January 30th.
This is the first small group course of 2019.
I'm sure I'll offer more small group courses on see more as the year goes on.
But for four of you, class begins on January 30th. I'll see you then!
